page.topic: Auto-Populating List Box and Combo Box Controls

section.description: When you place a list box or combo box control on a Form, Alpha Anywhere offers several different ways to automatically populate the control. The controls can be automatically populated with various internal Alpha Anywhere lists or dynamic lists of data.

section.title: Internal Alpha Anywhere Lists
section.description: The following is a sampling of the lists that Alpha Anywhere can automatically generate.

case.description: Layouts (like Forms, Reports, etc.) in the current database
Saved Operations (like Export, Copy, Append) in the current database
Tables or Sets in the current database

section.title: Dynamic Lists of Data
section.description: You can generate a dynamic list of data using an expression that returns a CR-LF delimited list of values. There are two ways to do this:

case.description: Modify the choices properties of a list box, combo box, or tree control
Use a record-list list box or combo box based a table or set

section.description: For example, the filter expression that controls the records that are shown in a Record List-List Box control on a form can be based on a variable or other field on the form. as the value in that variable changes (specified in the Watch Expression ), the records shown in the Record List are updated.
